snippet: The judge in the Aurora theater shooting case says jury selection is going so efficiently that the first phase will be cut short.
abstract: Colorado Judge Carlos A Samour Jr, presiding over 2012 Aurora theater shooting case, says jury selection is going so efficiently that the first phase will be cut short; prosecutors are seeking death penalty against suspect James Holmes, charged with killing 12 people and injuring 70 others; Holmes pleaded not guilty by reason of insanity.
lead_paragraph: The judge in the Aurora theater shooting case says jury selection is going so efficiently that the first phase will be cut short.

headline.main: Colorado: Rapid Jury Selection in Mass Killing at Movie Theater
headline.print_headline: Colorado: Rapid Jury Selection in Mass Killing at Movie Theater
